name: Nissan Altima
description: The Nissan Altima is a stylish midsize sedan known for its comfort, advanced safety features, and fuel efficiency.

name: Nissan Rogue
description: The Nissan Rogue is a popular compact SUV offering versatility, spacious interior, and advanced technology features.

name: Nissan Sentra
description: The Nissan Sentra is a reliable compact sedan, featuring modern design, fuel efficiency, and advanced safety technology.

name: Nissan Murano
description: The Nissan Murano is a midsize SUV with a sleek design, comfortable interior, and a smooth, quiet ride.

name: Nissan Maxima
description: The Nissan Maxima is a full-size sedan offering a powerful engine, upscale interior, and advanced technology.

name: Nissan Kicks
description: The Nissan Kicks is a subcompact SUV with a sporty design, efficient performance, and advanced safety features.

name: Nissan Armada
description: The Nissan Armada is a full-size SUV offering spacious seating, towing capabilities, and premium features.

name: Nissan Versa
description: The Nissan Versa is a subcompact sedan known for its affordability, fuel efficiency, and practicality.

name: Nissan Pathfinder
description: The Nissan Pathfinder is a midsize SUV with off-road capabilities, a comfortable interior, and advanced safety features.

name: Nissan Titan
description: The Nissan Titan is a full-size truck known for its powerful performance, towing capacity, and rugged design.
